text: Davron Atabaev (born 6 July 1993) is a Tajikistani sprinter specialising in the 400 metres. He represented his country at the 2018 World Indoor Championships. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2010 |Youth Olympic Games |Singapore |2nd (C) |200 m |22.24 |- |rowspan=3|2012 |rowspan=2|Asian Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Colombo, Sri Lanka |27th (h) |100 m |11.22 |- |14th (sf) |200 m |22.53 |- |World Junior Championships |Barcelona, Spain |57th (h) |100 m |11.11 |- |rowspan=2|2013 |rowspan=2|Universiade |rowspan=2|Kazan, Russia |36th (h) |100 m |10.98 |- |41st (h) |200 m |22.25 |- |rowspan=2|2014 |rowspan=2|Asian Games |rowspan=2|Incheon, South Korea |25th (h) |200 m |21.91 |- |25th (h) |400 m |49.10 |- |rowspan=2|2015 |rowspan=2|Asian Championships |rowspan=2|Wuhan, China |22nd (sf) |100 m |10.75 |- |25th (h) |200 m |21.85 |- |2016 |Asian Indoor Championships |Doha, Qatar |24th (h) |60 m |7.09 |- |rowspan=6|2017 |rowspan=3|Asian Championships |rowspan=3|Bhubaneswar, India |26th (h) |100 m |10.90 |- |18th (h) |400 m |48.54 |- |9th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:17.18 |- |rowspan=3|Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games |rowspan=3|Ashgabat, Turkmenistan |21st (h) |60 m |7.11 |- |6th (sf) |400 m |48.57 |- | – |4 × 400 m relay |DQ |- |rowspan=2|2018 |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |21st (h) |400 m |49.20 |- |Asian Games |Jakarta, Indonesia |19th (sf) |400 m |48.89 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *100 metres – 10.53 (+1.9 m/s, Dushanbe 2016) *200 metres – 20.95 (+1.8 m/s, Dushanbe 2016) NR *400 metres – 47.60 (Almaty 2017) NR Indoor *60 metres – 7.09 (Doha 2016) *400 metres – 48.57 (Ashgabat 2017) ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Tajikistani male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Tajikistan Category:Competitors at the 2013 Summer Universiade
title: Davron Atabaev
